statements: DELETE FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'River A';
DELETE FROM water_quality_monitoring_data WHERE date = '2022-06-15' AND ph_level > 6.5 AND dissolved_oxygen < 5.0;
DELETE FROM WaterQualityData WHERE location = 'River A' AND parameter = 'pH'
DELETE FROM water_sources WHERE location = 'River' AND source_type = 'Lake'
DELETE FROM water_quality_data WHERE site_id = 1 AND measurement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM water_quality_trends WHERE trend_value < 50 AND trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM water_quality_trends WHERE site_id = 3 AND parameter_id = 2;
